Benchmark.title: Linux User Home Dir XCCDF
Benchmark.description: This document defines a small set of rules used to verify that a user on the system is specified a home directory and the home directory exists.
Benchmark.notice: This would be a sample Terms of Use

Group.title: Linux User Home Directory Rules
Group.description: Requirements relating to the specification and existence of user home directories.

Rule.title: GEN001440 - Users' Assigned Home Directories
Rule.description: All users existing within the /etc/passwd file must be assigned a home directory.
Rule.fixtext: Verify that all users specified within /etc/passwd are assigned a home directory.

Rule.title: GEN001460 - Users' Home Directories Exist
Rule.description: Accounts existing within the /etc/passwd file must have a password.
Rule.fixtext: Verify that every home directory specified within the /etc/passwd file exists.
